items.label: Commencement of application for leave to appeal
Commencement of application for leave to cross-appeal
Preparation of memorandum of opposition to item 1 or 2
Preparation for hearing of defended application
Appearance at hearing of defended application
items.explanation: Appearance in Court measured in half days

items.label: Second and subsequent counsel if allowed by Court
items.explanation: 50% of allowance for appearance for principal counsel

costs.label: Applications for extension of time where application granted under rule 29A(2)﻿(a)

items.label: Preparation of application
Consent to application
Preparation of case on appeal
Preparation for and attendance at pre-hearing or case management conference
Preparation for hearing of appeal
Appearance at hearing of appeal
items.explanation: Appearance in Court measured in days

items.label: Second and subsequent counsel if allowed by Court
items.explanation: 50% of allowance for appearance for principal counsel

items.label: Filing—
an application for leave to appeal
an application for special leave to appeal
an application for leave to appeal out of time
a notice of appeal (unless a fee has been paid under paragraph (a), (b), or (c) in respect of the same matter)
an application for judicial review
an application for a review of a Registrar's decision
Filing an interlocutory application not specified in item 1
For scheduling the hearing date for an application or proceeding,—
in the case of an interlocutory application
in the case of an application specified in item 1(a), (b), or (c)
in any other case
Hearing a proceeding relating to an application specified in item 1(a), (b), or (c) or 2
Hearing any other proceeding, for each half-day or part of a half-day after the first day
Sealing an order or a judgment and providing, at the same time, any duplicate or certified copy of that order or judgment
Copying a judgment,—
for the first copy that is provided to a party to the proceeding or that party's counsel
where paragraph (a) does not apply
Copying any document (other than a judgment),—
for the first copy of any part or parts of the court file or any document relating to the appeal that is provided to a party to the proceeding or that party's counsel
where paragraph (a) does not apply,—
for each black and white page
for each colour page
for documents in electronic form
Searching or inspecting the formal court record kept in the registry of the court under the Court of Appeal (Access to Court Documents) Rules 2009,—
for the first name or case searched
for each additional name or case searched

Requesting access to a document under rule 7 of the Court of Appeal (Access to Court Documents) Rules 2009 or applying under rule 12 of those rules for permission to access documents, a court file, or the formal court record,—
if a fee has been paid under item 9 in respect of the document, court file, or formal court record
in any other case
